name: EDGE CASE
description:
EDGE CASE is a puzzle game about navigating, linking and altering the game world. It includes 22 levels of gradually increasing difficulty.

It is recommended, though not necessary, to have a pen and paper nearby to take notes, especially in the later levels.

Made with PuzzleScript and uses Pedro PSI's GameBar.

Completely stuck on a level? No idea what to do? A hint may help! Visit the hint sheet.
